description:
Power On and Off WebOS LG TVs together with your PC.

This application (UI and service) controls LG WebOS TVs and displays.
This is the same changelog as for v4.4.0, but with an important bugfix:
New and improved:
- Important improvements and optimizations to management of system shutdown and suspend
- Signed binaries, courtesy of SignPath.io and the SignPath Foundation
- Additional command line (see full documentation)
  -volume - set device volume
  -servicemenu - show service menu
  -servicemenu_legacy_enable - enable the legacy, more feature complete, service menu
  -servicemenu_legacy_disable - use the default service menu
  -servicemenu_tpc_enable - enable Temporal Peak Control (TPC)
  -servicemenu_tpc_disable - disable Temporal Peak Control
  -servicemenu_gsr_enable - enable Global Stress Reduction (GSR)
  -servicemenu_gsr_disable - disable Global Stress Reduction
Bugfix in v4.4.1
- System did not suspend properly with "Persistent connections" enabled"
